PATIENT_ID: TEST_ROTEM_002
ARRIVAL_TIME: 2026-01-20 10:00:00

[TRAUMA_HP] 2026-01-20 10:10:00
Category II activation for 55-year-old female, ground-level fall.
BP 132/78, HR 82, RR 16, GCS 15. Hemodynamically stable.
Left wrist deformity. No active bleeding noted.

[PHYSICIAN_NOTE] 2026-01-20 10:30:00
Distal radius fracture confirmed on imaging.
No hemorrhagic resuscitation required. No blood products administered.
Splint applied. Orthopedic follow-up arranged.
